backend/main.mo: Main ICP actor implementing the attendance system backend with student profile management, attendance recording, and role-based access control using storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Minimal migration module that defines a no-op state migration function for the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the student registration fix to specific frontend files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including sidebar, chart, and UI element variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages authentication state, conditionally renders admin or student views, and shows a profile setup modal for new users.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Landing screen shown to unauthenticated users with an app description and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/admin/Attendance: Admin component that displays all attendance records in a searchable, sortable table with student name resolution and CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/RegisterSt: Admin form component for registering new students by capturing or uploading a face photo along with name and ID, then submitting to the backend with upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/StudentsMa: Admin component that lists all registered students in a searchable table with avatars, student IDs, and active status badges.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky app header showing the FaceAttend brand, authenticated user avatar with admin badge, theme toggle, and logout button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts first-time authenticated users to enter their name and saves it as a user profile via the backend.
frontend/src/components/student/Attendan: Student-facing component that renders a scrollable, date-sorted list of attendance records showing class ID, date, and time.
frontend/src/components/student/FaceReco: Student component that captures a live camera photo, compares it pixel-by-pixel against the stored face image, and records attendance if similarity exceeds a threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login/logout state and persisting identity across page reloads using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for all backend actor calls including user profiles, student profiles, attendance records, and face recognition operations, with cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page with three tabs for managing students, registering new students, and viewing attendance history.
frontend/src/pages/StudentAttendance.tsx: Student-facing page that allows marking attendance via a face recognition scanner and displays a summary of past attendance records.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based colors, border radii, accordion animations, and enabling the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state at version 5, noting a broken student registration issue and two existing features: deploying FaceAttend to IC mainnet and fixing the student registration form.
